item.title: Unable to load dynamic library '/usr/lib/php5/20131226/curl.so'
item.description: Full error as follows: PHP Warning: PHP Startup: Unable to load dynamic library '/usr/lib/php5/20131226/curl.so' - /usr/lib/php5/20131226/curl.so: undefined symbol: zend_unset_property in Unknown on line 0 Solution: See https://ismael.casimpan.com/quicktasks-php/install-php-curl-56-ubuntu/
